snippet: The Ukrainian cases are the first time polio has been seen in Europe in five years, but a World Health Organization official said the outbreak appeared to be small.
abstract: World Health Organization says two children in western Ukraine have been paralyzed by strain of polio contained in oral polio vaccine; it is first case of polio in Europe in five years; outbreaks stemming from vaccine-derived virus sometimes occur and are usually limited.
lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian cases are the first time polio has been seen in Europe in five years, but a World Health Organization official said the outbreak appeared to be small.

headline.main: Polio Paralyzes 2 Children in West Ukraine Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Polio Paralyzes 2 Children in West Ukraine Outbreak
